actions.committee: Committee on Environment and Public Works
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Energy Conservation Policy Act to establish a water conservation requirement for Federal buildings, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Water Conservation Act of 1991 - Amends the National Energy Conservation Policy Act to mandate that Federal agencies install in Federal buildings: (1) all water conservation measures with payback periods of less than ten years; and (2) the most water efficient appliances commercially available when installing new or replacing existing appliances. Excludes a building from compliance if the responsible agency head finds that compliance would be impracticable, according to General Services Administration standards.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Energy Conservation Policy Act to establish a water conservation requirement for Federal buildings, and for other purposes.
